title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Using Amazon Nova Act to simplify login workflows (AIM271)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Nova Act 简化登录工作流程 (AIM271)
abstract: Amazon Nova Act redefines what’s possible for intelligent and scalable automation. It can navigate the web independently, interpret complex patterns, and adapt as needed. In this session, you’ll learn how 1Password is using Amazon Nova Act to streamline the login experience for consumers and businesses alike. You’ll see how Amazon Nova Act makes it possible to understand and automate the login experience at scale, across thousands of sites. This presentation is brought to you by 1PASSWORD, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: Amazon Nova Act 重新定义了智能化和可扩展自动化的可能性。它能够独立导航网页、解释复杂模式并根据需要进行调整。在本次会议中，您将了解 1Password 如何使用 Amazon Nova Act 来简化消费者和企业的登录体验。您将看到 Amazon Nova Act 如何能够大规模理解和自动化数千个网站的登录体验。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 1PASSWORD 提供。
